text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) xo mnusʹy xey nænxn sacthrrm cak phracea khxng phwk than di mayang phwk than læw dangnan phu dı ptibati tam næwthang thi thuk txng thæcring khea danein tam næwthang thi thuk txng pheux taw khxng khea læa phu dı hlng thang thæcring khea k hlng thang pheux taw khxng khea læa chan mi di pen phu khumkan phwk than
